    "import os, sys; sys.path.append(os.path.abspath('../../../'))\n",
    "from mdl.roi import ROI"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "##### Read ROI from photoshop PSD files"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "i = '/Users/mdl-admin/Desktop/roi/raw/'\n",
    "o = '/Users/mdl-admin/Desktop/roi/output/'\n",
    "m = '/Users/mdl-admin/Desktop/roi/metadata.xlsx'\n",
    "roi = mdl.eyetracking.ROI(isMultiprocessing=True, isDebug=True, image_path=i, output_path=o, s_metadata=m, scale=1, \n",
    "\t\t\t\t\t\t  screensize=[1920,1080], shape='straight', f_roi='dataviewer', roicolumn=\"feature\",\n",
    "\t\t\t\t\t\t  uuid=None, add_column='top')\n",
    "df, error = roi.process()"
   ]
